title: WTB: T227 Series of Champions Bruce Brown (Auto Racer)
author: Baseball Rarities

posts.post_title: WTB: T227 Series of Champions Bruce Brown (Auto Racer)
posts.post_content: Will accept any condition as long as it will receive a numerical grade. Obviously, looking for as nice of a copy as possible, but I am not that picky at this point. Willing to pay an aggressive price or have lots to trade.
Best of luck to you. I'd love to have this one for my racing collection but that will never happen. No way I'll have the money if it actually ever surfaces.
